sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import "../styles/RSVPModal.css"; export default function RSVPModal({ open, onClose }) { const [data, setData] = useState({ assistanceConfirmation: "", firstAssistant: "", secondAssistant: "", thirdAssistant: "", fourthAssistant: "", fifthAssistant: "", sixthAssistant: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setData({ ...data, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const { assistanceConfirmation, firstAssistant, secondAssistant, thirdAssistant, fourthAssistant, fifthAssistant, sixthAssistant, } = data; if (!open) return null; return ReactDOM.createPortal( <>

¿Asistís a la fiesta?

setYes(e.target.value)} > setNo(e.target.value)} >

Indicanos quienes asistirán / no asistirán
  • setFirstAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setSecondAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setThirdAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setFourthAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setFifthAssistant(e.target.value)} >
  • setSixthAssistant(e.target.value)} >
, document.getElementById("portal") ); }; }
